examples: had a streak of bad luck
Nicklaus had a run of birdies

definitions.text: a narrow marking of a different color or texture from the background
examples: a green toad with small black stripes or bars
may the Stars and Stripes forever wave

definitions.text: move quickly in a straight line
examples: The plane streaked across the sky

definitions.text: run naked in a public place
mark with spots or blotches of different color or shades of color as if stained
